user_instruction: 'Compose an email to Mark Johnson (mark@helpinghands.org) with the necessary details for the upcoming charity gala. You can check out my NotionManager for information.'

formatted_items.content:
Subject: Request for Charity Gala Details for Email to Mark Johnson

Hi [Notion Manager],

I hope you’re doing well. I’m preparing an email for Mark Johnson (mark@helpinghands.org) that needs to include all the key information about the upcoming charity gala. Could you please provide or point me to the latest details in Notion, including:

• Event date, time, and venue  
• Agenda / run-of-show  
• Dress code and theme (if any)  
• Confirmed guest speaker(s) and their speaking slots  
• Sponsorship or donor acknowledgements that should be mentioned  
• Any important deadlines or calls-to-action for Mark and his team  

If everything is already documented in Notion, just let me know the exact page or database to review. Otherwise, a quick summary would be perfect.

Thank you very much for your help!

Best regards,  
[Your Name]

final_output:
